pageContext.claim: “We’re opening up massive Apple plants....When I wanted Apple to do, from day one -- from before I got elected -- I said, 'Someday we're going to see Apple building plants in our country, not in China.' And that’s what’s happening.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did not open this Texas plant and it is not even an Apple plant. It is a Flex Ltd. Plant which has been making Mac Pro computers since 2013 under a contract with Apple. Apple in November had broken ground on a new $1 billion campus in Austin near the plant, with a scheduled opening in 2022.
